  499  cd Documents/Personal/Repo/Course/
  500  mkdir GHActions
  501  cd GHActions/
  502  brew install gh
  503  gh auth login
  504  gh repo fork ibm-developer-skills-network/wtecc-CICD_PracticeCode --clone=true
  505  cd wtecc-CICD_PracticeCode
  506  ll
  507  mkdir -p .github/workflows
  508  cd .github/workflows/
  521  git config --global user.email "magno.araujo@gmail.com"
  522  git config --global user.name "Magno Araujo"
  523  git add -A
  524  git commit -m "COMMIT MESSAGE"
  525  history > command_history.txt
 cd Documents/Personal/Repo/Course/
 mkdir GHActions
 cd GHActions/
 brew install gh
 gh auth login
 gh repo fork ibm-developer-skills-network/wtecc-CICD_PracticeCode --clone=true
 cd wtecc-CICD_PracticeCode
 ll
 mkdir -p .github/workflows
 cd .github/workflows/
 git config --global user.email "magno.araujo@gmail.com"
 git config --global user.name "Magno Araujo"
 git add -A
 git commit -m "COMMIT MESSAGE"
 history > command_history.txt
